title: No Giro d’Italia drama ‘s’il vous plait’: COVID-19 protocols to return to the Tour de France
content:
Reuters reports strict anti-COVID measures will be enforced as masks, distancing, and 'bubbles' return to the Tour de France.

Read the full article at No Giro d’Italia drama ‘s’il vous plait’: COVID-19 protocols to return to the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
